com.anotherservice.util

Class Logger

  • Object
    • Logger

  • public class Logger
extends Object
    This class relies on the java.util.logging framework but provides a bit more flexibility. For instance, if you are not using the logging framework, you can set a PrintStream to redirect the output. You can also customize a bit what components will be logged (time, class, method).
    Author:
    Simon Uyttendaele
